author: protolambda
content:
Attacknet was already deprecated a while ago, with the shift to bounty program. Terminated the nodes today. We are spinning up new infra for devnets, and if you need a v1.0.0 network to test and bug hunt, you are more than welcome to join those.
We are starting off next week with a devnet with a single week lifespan, then moving to a bigger longer net. Just contact me if you want to jump in early. Later larger net will be public, dev-controlled, and a good target for bug hunting.
